description:
Business success is a significant function of employeeâ€™s motivation and performance, adequate work directions and specific, effective and stimulating measures. Influencing staff and managing for better business motivation ensures outstanding performances and eliminates complicated challenges. Leadership and job performance skills safeguard and control organisational loyalty.

Course is designed for managers and supervisors at all levels, who want to get a structured overview of all elements of managing people.

Content of the course is about 35 minutes
title: People Management - Overview
